label: positionCode
comment: The code specifying a position of this monitoring sensor.
The code specifying the position of this monitoring IOT device.

domainIncludes.comment: An object or system made or adapted for an IOT (Internet of Things) purpose such as to collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data especially when connected to a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment.
An object which can detect and measure physical properties and which can record, indicate and even transmit such measurements locally.
